caption.p: ( a, b) The CV curves of Co(OH) 2 nanowires and heterojunction α-Co(OH) 2/α-Ni(OH) 2 nanorods at various scanning speed in three-electrode system, respectively, ( c) the corresponding CV curves at 10 mV s −1 in three-electrode system, ( d, e) the curves with various scanning speed of Co(OH) 2 nanowires and α-Co(OH) 2/α-Ni(OH) 2 heterojunction in two-electrode system, respectively, ( f) the CV curves at 10 mV s −1 in two-electrode system.
